description: This is the main entry point of a React application which initializes the app by rendering the <App /> component into the DOM element with ID 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS file, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders JSX into the DOM to display the React component tree.
